RPG Arena

About map

RPG Arena (RPA) is a map for Warcraft 3: Reforged in the hero arena genre. It features unusual gameplay, good location design, unique heroes and high replay value. On this site you can always download the latest version of the map, find out the news and get the information you are interested in.

Features

  • 27 original heroes
  • 164 non-standard items
  • Over 54 types of custom monsters
  • Beautiful design of locations
  • High replay value

News

The new version will be released in March 2020

Changelog

  • 3.3 >>

    • GLOBAL
    • Continued work on adapting the map to Reforged.
    • BUGFIX
    • The hero "Barbarian" could use the ability "Blow of Fury" on himself. This is fixed.
    • The hero "Barbarian" in the description of the ability "Mighty Blows" indicated a miss chance of 23%, but in fact it was 15%, this is fixed and now the miss chance is really 23%.
    • Fixed many errors in the descriptions of items, abilities and interface.
    • NEW
    • Added presets for the duration of the game in the choice of mods ("fast", "normal", "long", "epic")
    • FullHD looading screen added
    • The "Battle Troll" is now automatically selected when the duration of the "Berserker" ability passes and a message appears when it cannot be selected
    • CHANGES
    • "Dragon Heart" item now costs 150 coins more
    • The item "Barbarian Axe" now requires only one axe to assemble, but costs more.
    • The iten "Skullcrusher" now requires only one hammer to assemble, but costs more.
    • The hero of "Lord of the Forest" has a reduced speed, but an increased starting health reserve.
    • The hero of "Lord of the Forest" has slowed the recharging of "Guard Owl" to 400 seconds.
    • Hero "Mushrom Man" accelerated reloading ability "Spores" from 60 sec to 25 sec
    • Hero "Mushroom Man" has changed the ability "Acid swamp", reload is not 80sec, But 50sec, Damage 10% / 15% / 20%
    • The hero "Thunderer" three times increased ability "Branched Lightning"
    • Eating 5 trees from the hero of the "Defender of the Forest" now gives + 50hp, not 25hp.
    • The hero "Necromancer" reinforced "Cemetery", he added + 10/13/16 protection
    • The hero "Necromancer" reinforced skeletons, they added resistance to ranged attacks
    • The hero "Necromancer" has an enhanced Essence ability: HP (%) 50/55/60/65/70/75/80
    • The "Spider Queen" hero has intermediate values for the spider web ability: Duration (heroes): 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5 Duration (creeps): 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5 / 5.5 / 6
    • The hero "Battle Troll" has intermediate values for the ability of the Network: Duration (heroes): | r 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5 Duration (creeps): 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5 / 5.5 / 6
    • Hero "Shaman" has intermediate values added to the ability "Shield of the Ancients": Duration: 2 / 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5
    • Hero "Druid" summoned bear stronger
    • The item "Axe of Madness" has been weakened, now increases attack speed by 100%, and not by 150%, and the damage taken increases by 100%, not by 50%
    • A Golem summoned by the "Mechanism" can now deal a crushing blow, which deals 200 damage and stuns the enemy for 2/3 seconds.
    • Rune of Battle now increases attack power by 25% instead of 50%
    • Rune of Defense now increases protection by 5s, and not by 10
    • Rune of Healing now restores 25% of HP, instead of 50%
    • Wind Rune now increases attack speed by 25%, not 30%, and movement speed by 15%, not 30%

    3.2.1 >>

    • BUGFIX
    • Creeps killed by the "Sword of Midas" did not respawn
    • The creeps killed by the Necromancer "Corpse Explosion" ability did not respawn.
    • Creeps resurrected by the ability to "Revive the skeleton" of the "Necromancer" did not respawn
    • NEW
    • A message is displayed to the player who has not spent the points of the characteristics and wants to leave the base
    • CHANGES
    • Work continued on adapting the map to the reforged (scenery on locations was changed, model scaling was fixed)
    • "Swamp golems" in the "Swamps" location replaced by "Morlocks" level 6

    3.2 >>

    • GLOBAL
    • The map is now Reforged friendly. Bugs that arose in Reforged were fixed, new models were correctly scaled, models of heroes and monsters were replaced with more suitable ones, the design of all locations was changed so that they looked good in Reforged.
    • BUGFIX
    • Fixed a very rare, but extremely serious bug, when the hero "Vampire" received 100% health regeneration per second, which made him virtually
    • Fixed a bug where all players received the message "you got 25 experience points and 25 gold" for no reason

    3.1 >>

    • BUGFIX
    • The "Lord of the Forest" message about increasing the maximum health reserve, as a result of eating trees, was displayed to ALL players, now the message is displayed directly to the player
    • The "Holy Grail" item did not restore health and mana when leveling up
    • Fixed a bug with the "Miner Helmet", as a result of which, if you drop the helmet in the "Mines" location, the effect of it will remain until the end of the game
    • The "Wisp" hero fixed a bug due to which, in the event of a player’s victory, the generator remained in the arena and had the opportunity to teleport to it
    • The "Wisp" hero has fixed a bug due to which the player was given money and experience when the generator was destroyed
    • The "Demonologist" has corrected the description of the ability "Archdemon", reload 122sec for 62 sec, which corresponds to the truth
    • "Water Elemental" has a description of Water Void ability relative to the amount of mana consumed
    • Wolf Robe: Fixed a description in the recipe where boots were needed, instead of speed boots
    • NEW
    • Now after the battle in the arena, all heroes return to base with 100% health and 100% mana and fully recharged abilities, heroes who died in the arena return to base with 100% health and 100% mana and fully recharged abilities
    • Now, if the hero dies in the arena, then the player does not lose gold
    • One minute before the battle, now there is a sound and text notification to all players
    • Music plays at the end of the game
    • CHANGES
    • Moonstone: with each level increase, not 50%, but 100% health and mana is restored
    • Midas Sword: attack bonus reduced from +15 to +7
    • Mithril sword: price increased from 200 to 220 coins
    • The Bloodletter: attack bonus reduced from +16 to +10, price reduced from 970 to 700 coins
    • Bloodthirst: vampirism 50% for 3 seconds, not 100%
    • Holy Grail: with each level increase, 100% of health and mana is restored, not 50% as before, 20%, and not 10% of health is restored from the maximum health reserve, cooldown is increased from 5 to 10 seconds, now consumes 50 mana with each use;
    • Miner helmet: in the "Mines" location, the attack and movement speed does not increase by 50%, but by 25%, the price is reduced from 200 to 170 coins
    • Dwarf helmet: now requires a Miner’s helmet, but gives Night Vision (allows you to see at night as during the day) and Miner (in the "Mines" location + 25% attack and movement speed), the price has been reduced from 320 to 300 coins
    • Armor of the mountain king: gives Night Vision (allows you to see at night as during the day) Ore miner (in the "Mines" location + 25% attack and movement speed)
    • Master’s Ring: Now does not give an effect upon activation, but increases all attributes by 45 units, instead of 25 units

    3.0 >>

    • GLOBAL
    • Global map changes. New items, big changes in gameplay, new design of all locations, updated interface, many bugs fixed. Unfortunately, changelog did not manage this version, but there are really a lot of changes, and because of this, a jump occurred immediately from version 2.4 to 3.0. Show changelog older versions on the site i do not consider it necessary.
